inscription:
Signature; Inscription

LR: [Merry Christmas and Happy New Year to Bud Wimmer from his friend Norman Rockwell] UC:[ Winter]; LC: [1958] in cartouche; sheets squared for transfer
provenance: The artist; given to Bud Wimmer, Minnesota; passed to Virginia J. Wimmer, until d. 1995; Estate of Virginia J. Wimmer, until 1998; bequethed to MIA.
signed: LR in graphite: [NORMAN ROCKWEL ] as part of inscription
title: Boy and Dog: For Sale
